SerialPort.name: Serial port
SerialPort.description: The (virtual) serial port connected to the UPS

UpsShutdownTimers.name: Shut down delay
UpsShutdownTimers.description: Yadoms sends these timers to UPS at shut down command, to manage how the UPS output is power-cut and restored

ShutdownDelay.name: Shut down delay (minutes)
ShutdownDelay.description: After receiving command from Yadoms, UPS will wait this delay before shutting down its output. It's useful to let system stop properly.

UpsRestoreTimer.name: Restore configuration
UpsRestoreTimer.description: After AC power is recovered, UPS will wait for this delay before to restore power at output, if enabled.
